heading: Today
text: Morning clouds breaking for periods of sun.  A chance of a few localized showers, especially over the higher terrain.  Highs in the upper 60s to mid 70s.  Winds becoming west to northwest near 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Any evening showers ending.  Partial clearing.  Areas of dense fog forming.  Lows in the upper 40s and 50s.  Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Saturday
text: Areas of morning fog lifting for sun, mixed with clouds.  More clouds south in the afternoon.  Highs in the upper 60s to mid 70s.  Winds light and variable.
